comments.body:
Also:

```powershell
Measure-Command { $hash = @{}; 1..200000 | % { $hash.Add($_, $null) } }
> TotalMilliseconds : 1803.0842

Measure-Command { $hash = @{}; 1..200000 | & { process { $hash.Add($_, $null) } } }
> TotalMilliseconds : 331.2696
```

title: ParameterBinding from pipeline is significantly slower than from command line
